0.1.0.name: connect20/Medma_Copyoptions
0.1.0.description: A very simple but useful extension that allows admin to copy custom options from any product to number of products. So if you need to add some custom options to large number of products, you don't need to edit each of them now, just edit one and copy the custom options to other multiple products.
